title: Print on Celebration of 15th Amendment - context

content.question: Which of the following historical events best explains the development depicted in the image?

choices.label: The issuing of the Emancipation Proclamation
The granting of birthright citizenship to Black Americans
The service of African Americans in public office
The overturning of the Supreme Courtâ€™s ruling in Dred Scott v. Sandford

content.answer: The service of African Americans in public office

skill.text: 1.B: Identify and explain the context of a specific event, development, or process.
